model_answer: The answer is C: Event 6: The tour highlights dense cabinetry and compartmented interior spaces (galley, chart table, upholstery), creating many nooks and crannies that make parts of the cabin darker on camera.
The answer is C: Event 7: He becomes enthusiastic about the interior, calling the carpentry the nicest woodworking he’s ever seen and highlighting quality—priming a focus on joinery.
